ComicInfo.Summary:
The Pathfinder heroes have been tested by the City of Secrets and,
by the end of this chapter, it will leave its mark upon them. Divided, betrayed, and outmaneuvered at every turn, can the group go onâ€¦
or is this where their adventure ends? Paizo's award-winning game world is brought to life in a pulse-pounding comic adventure! Each issue contains bonus rules material and a pull-out map for the award-winning Pathfinder RPG.
